k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[:k] + "..." if len(s) > k else s)

k, s = input(), input()
if k > len(s):
    print(s)
else:
    print(s[:k] + '...')

k = int(input())
s = str(input())
print(s[:k] + '...' if len(s) > k else s)

print(input()[:int(input())] + '...' if len(input()) > int(input()) else input())


k = int(input())
s = str(input())

print(s[0:k]+"..." if len(s) > k else s)
